description: A CSS file containing styles and variables for theming a React application, including light and dark theme definitions.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main styling class for the application, providing layout and theme colors.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles the header section of the application with flexbox layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links, defining color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.
